amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for military construction for the Navy by $99 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 12 in the Congressional Record of June 16, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill by $99 million. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funds for a berthing wharf and controlled industrial facility at North Island Naval Air Station in California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Horn amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 294 (Roll no. 395).
